body:
I see. I've found that this works, but not sure if it is less ugly:
```
template<typename index_tt = index_t>
std::enable_if<!std::is_same<index_tt, int64_t>::value>::type
```

See https://godbolt.org/z/bIX4_O .

Keep it as-is also SGTM. BTW, if you want to use `enable_if_t`, we have it as `c10::guts::enable_if_t`.
